dialogue.htmlContent: From what Helena told you earlier, you know that she's in need of someone to help her in implementing her plans for this business. If you wanted to, you could always offer her your assistance...

Pushing open the front door and entering the shop, you're greeted once again by the sight of the stunningly-beautiful matriarch sitting down behind the shop's counter. #IF(pc.hasCompanion(scarlett)) Betraying no sign of emotion on her gorgeous face, she pointedly stares at [scarlett.name] for a moment, before looking back at you and stating in her clam, melodic voice, #ELSE Betraying no sign of emotion on her gorgeous face, she states in her clam, melodic voice, #ENDIF [helena.speech(I do so hope that you aren't daring to return to me without being in possession of the paint which I ordered you to retrieve.)]

Not wanting to wait a moment longer than is necessary, you quickly tell Helena that you've purchased the golden paint she asked for. Letting a slight smile settle on her face, the matriarch ushers you forwards with a gentle swish of one wing, before commanding, [helena.speech(Step forwards and show it to me without delay.)]

You reluctantly admit to Helena that you haven't yet purchased the golden paint she asked for. With a dismissive swipe of her wing, she coldly declares, #IF(helena.hasSlaves()) [helena.speech(That being the case, if you are not interested in purchasing the slaves I have for sale, then it would please me if you were to immediately get out of my sight.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(That being the case, it would please me if you were to immediately get out of my sight.)] #ENDIF

Not wanting to annoy the matriarch by remaining in her presence for a moment longer than is necessary, you think that it would be best for you to quickly exit her store...

Pushing open the front door and entering Helena's shop, you once again see the gorgeous harpy sitting behind the shop's counter. With a mild look of satisfaction on her angelic face, she offers you some rare praise, [helena.speech(I was most pleased to see that you'd done as I asked when I arrived here this morning. Well done, [pc.name].)]

By now knowing what's expecting of you, and not wanting to do anything to ruin the haughty matriarch's apparent good mood, you quickly reply, [pc.speech(Thank you, Helena.)]

[helena.speech(I suppose I should inform you that I am not planning on stocking any more slaves until after all this renovation work has been completed,)] she reveals, [helena.speech(If you were still in the market for purchasing slaves of your own, then you have my permission to buy them from someone other than me.)]

You don't recall ever being told that you weren't allowed to buy slaves from stores other than Helena's, but decide to keep that fact to yourself as she continues, [helena.speech(Today you will be painting the exterior of my store. Take those cans of white paint and whatever other supplies you need outside.)]

#IF(pc.hasCompanion(scarlett)) Dismissively gesturing towards the supplies sitting near to the front entrance, Helena shoots you and [scarlett.name] a piercing look, making it very clear that she expects you complete this task as quickly as possible. Not wanting to disappoint, you and your [scarlett.companion] hurry over to the entrance and carry the supplies out in front of her shop. #ELSE Dismissively gesturing towards the supplies sitting near to the front entrance, Helena shoots you a piercing look, making it very clear that she expects you complete this task as quickly as possible. Not wanting to disappoint, you hurry over to the entrance and carry the supplies out in front of her shop. #ENDIF After placing the last can down on the ground, you turn back towards the entrance only to see the regal matriarch exiting her shop. Once again locking the door behind her, she turns to face you and proclaims, [helena.speech(There's really nothing more for me to do here, so I shall be taking the rest of the day off once again. I expect all of the woodwork painted and looking absolutely perfect before the end of the day. I am also expecting a delivery of furniture some time within the next few hours, so you shall not leave until you have overseen the unloading of it. Do I make myself understood?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Helena,)] you once again find yourself replying, before politely pointing out the obvious fact that the front door is locked, and that you have no way of opening it for the deliverymen.

This detail clearly seems to have slipped Helena's mind, for she lets out an almost inaudible sigh in frustration, before beckoning you over to stand in front of her. Hurrying forwards, you come to a halt right in front of the dazzlingly-beautiful matriarch, who swiftly passes you a spare key, saying, [helena.speech(This shall be all you require. Once you have finished your work, you are to lock up and post it back through the letterbox.)]

Without waiting for your reply, the beautiful matriarch turns her back on you, before taking a few graceful, skipping steps and launching herself into the air. With several sweeps of her pristine, white wings, she quickly gains altitude, before wheeling around and flying off in the direction of the Harpy Nests once again.

Pushing open the front door, you once again find yourself stepping inside Helena's shop. Unlike the previous times you've been here, however, the harpy matriarch isn't sitting behind the counter, and is instead regally perched on one of the new sofas. As she notices your entrance, she puts down the fashion magazine she was reading, before beckoning you forwards with a wave of one of her elegant wings.

As you move over to where the beautiful harpy is sitting, she offers you an uncharacteristic smile and sincerely states, [helena.speech(I must say that you are exceeding the expectations I had of you, [pc.name]. Not only have you done an excellent job of painting the front of this establishment, but you've ensured that all of this furniture was delivered here without issue. #IF(pc.hasCompanion(scarlett)) I will permit you and [scarlett.name] to sit with me for a moment. #ELSE I will permit you to sit with me for a moment. #ENDIF )]

[pc.speech(Thank you, Helena,)] you say, knowing that all of your hard work could be undone if you don't show the haughty matriarch the respect she's accustomed to. #IF(pc.isTaur()) As you have the lower body of [pc.a_legRace], you're unable to sit on the sofa opposite Helena, and so make do with simply kneeling down on the plush rug beside her. #ELSE Following another sweeping gesture from one of her flawless white wings, you sit down on the stylish sofa opposite to Helena. #ENDIF #IF(pc.hasCompanion(scarlett)) Following your lead, [scarlett.name] thanks [scarlett.her] old matriarch before sitting down next to you, trying [scarlett.her] best not to do anything to draw Helena's ire. #ENDIF

[helena.speech(It would appear as though the commoners are beginning to take notice,)] the harpy observes, giving the briefest of nods towards the shop's large windows. Sure enough, as you look across, you see that a pretty squirrel-girl has stopped to take a closer look at the store, and as she peers through the windows and catches sight of Helena, she does a double-take and starts to stare at her in awe. Letting out an almost imperceptible sigh, the harpy reveals, [helena.speech(Thanks to my dear Scarlett's hard work this establishment has, up until now, had quite the poor reputation. As such, word of my presence here has thus far not spread, but it would appear as though that is about to change.)]

[pc.speech(That will be good for your business though, won't it?)] you quite rightly observe.

[helena.speech(I suppose so, yes,)] the harpy admits, [helena.speech(but the attention I often end up attracting can get quite tiring. In any case, there's no stopping it now, so with your help, I shall make it official.)]

Rising to her feet, the regal harpy elegantly sweeps one of her delicate wings towards the door. Following her lead, you also stand up, and turn to see that she's pointing towards the solitary can of golden paint which you'd previously purchased. Showing you a little more respect than you'd become accustomed to receiving from her, Helena asks, [helena.speech(If you would be so kind, I would ask of you to take that paint outside. I shall accompany you and oversee the completion of your next task.)]

Pushing open the front door, you once again find yourself stepping inside Helena's shop. Looking across to the other side of the room, you see the beautiful harpy matriarch perfectly postured upon one of the designer sofas. Noticing your entry, and seeing that [scarlett.name] is with you, she beckons the two of you towards her with a graceful sweep of one of her white-feathered wings.

Letting the door swing shut behind [scarlett.herHim], [scarlett.name] sulkily trails along behind you, and at Helena's request, [scarlett.she] #IF(pc.isTaur()) kneels down on the plush rug before the harpy matriarch. #ELSE sits down on the stylish sofa before the harpy matriarch. #ENDIF As you sit down beside your slave, Helena flashes you a slight smile and states, [helena.speech(My offer for the purchase of my dear Scarlett stands at [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames. I am sure that I need not remind you, but you will either accept my offer, or else I will have no choice but to close this business down.)]

#IF(scarlett.isLikesPlayer()) Looking across at your slave, you see her cast an affectionate glance your way, as though [scarlett.sheIs] trying to make it known that [scarlett.she]'d rather stay by your side. Picking up on the fact that the [scarlett.race] is quite fond of you, Helena kindly offers, [helena.speech(I have no intention of keeping you from seeing one another; you will always be welcome to visit my dear Scarlett at any time.)] #ELSE Looking across at your slave, you see her roll [scarlett.her] [scarlett.eyes], as though [scarlett.sheIs] trying to make it known that [scarlett.she] doesn't care what happens to [scarlett.herHim]. Unsure of whether or not the two of you are close to one another, Helena kindly offers, [helena.speech(I have no intention of keeping you from seeing one another; you will always be welcome to visit my dear Scarlett at any time.)] #ENDIF

Knowing that the offer of [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames must be close to double [scarlett.namePos] actual value, you realise that Helena's offer is extremely generous. Sensing your slight hesitation as you think things over, the beautiful harpy pointedly says, [helena.speech(If you are to refuse me here, [pc.name], then please understand that I shall not be pleased. Not be pleased at all...)]

Pushing open the front door, you once again find yourself stepping inside Helena's shop. Looking across to the other side of the room, you see the beautiful harpy matriarch perfectly postured upon one of the designer sofas. Noticing your entry, and seeing that [scarlett.name] is not with you, she makes a dismissive gesture with of one of her white-feathered wings and gently calls out, [helena.speech([pc.Name], please, I do not wish for you to bother me until you have my dear Scarlett by your side.)]

Knowing that your lingering presence would be likely to ruin Helena's positive opinion of you, you decide that it'd be for the best if you were to turn around and quickly make your leave...

#IF(scarlett.isLikesPlayer())

As you push open the door and [pc.step] inside Helena's shop, you can't help but be reminded of the very first time you ever set foot in here. Over on the far side of the room, the black-feathered form of Scarlett is slouched down behind the shop's trendy counter, and as she sees you enter she calls out, [scarlett.speech([pc.Name]?! You're back!)]

Before you have a chance to respond, the beautiful figure of Helena gracefully strides out of the back room, before looking across to her subordinate and stating, [helena.speech(My dear Scarlett, [pc.name] may be your friend, but while you are on duty, you will address [pc.herHim] in a professional manner.)]

#ELSE

As you push open the door and [pc.step] inside Helena's shop, you can't help but be reminded of the very first time you ever set foot in here. Over on the far side of the room, the black-feathered form of Scarlett is slouched down behind the shop's trendy counter, and as she sees you enter she rudely calls out, [scarlett.speech(What do you want, cunt?)]

Before you have a chance to respond, the beautiful figure of Helena gracefully strides out of the back room, before locking her icy gaze on her subordinate and coldly asking, [helena.speech(Would you like to try that again, my dear Scarlett?)]

#ENDIF

[scarlett.speech(Sorry, Helena!)] the raven-harpy exclaims as she bolts upright in her chair. Forcing a smile onto her face, she puts on a painfully fake tone of voice and sweetly asks you, [scarlett.speech(Please forgive my rudeness, [pc.name]. I am trying to be a better person, but sometimes I find myself slipping into my old ways. May I help you with anything today?)]

[helena.speech(Good girl,)] Helena says to her subordinate, before stepping over to softly stroke her black head feathers. Although she keeps the fake smile on her face, you see a wild, maniacal look in Scarlett's eyes, and she grits her teeth in frustration as Helena continues to pet her while saying to you, [helena.speech(You have come at a bad time, [pc.name]; my dear Scarlett and I are about to leave to meet with her sister. Could I trouble you to return #IF(game.getDayOfWeek()==DOW_FRIDAY) on Monday morning? #ELSE tomorrow morning? #ENDIF)]

Knowing that you have no option but to do as she asks, you tell Helena that you have no problem leaving and coming back to see her #IF(game.getDayOfWeek()==DOW_FRIDAY) on Monday morning. #ELSE tomorrow morning. #ENDIF After flashing you a slight smile, the harpy matriarch looks down at Scarlett and says, [helena.speech(Come along then, Scarlett, let us depart and pay your dear sister a visit.)]

[scarlett.speech(Yes, Helena...)] the raven-harpy sulkily replies, before standing up and accompanying the beautiful harpy as they start to walk towards the shop's exit. Knowing that you too need to leave, you [pc.step] back outside, holding the door open for them before moving aside and letting Helena lock it.

#IF(scarlett.isAbleToFly()) [style.speechFeminine(There she is! Helena! Helena! I'm your biggest fan!)] one of the members of the nearby crowd calls out as she sees the three of you exit the store. As the rest of Helena's fans start to shout and rush forwards, the harpy matriarch coolly tells them that she has no time at the moment, before gracefully skipping off and launching herself into the air. #IF(scarlett.isLikesPlayer()) Giving you one last smile, #ELSE Giving you one last scowl, #ENDIF Scarlett follows her matriarch, and as the two of them fly off, the fans let out out a collective sigh of disappointment. #ELSE [style.speechFeminine(There she is! Helena! Helena! I'm your biggest fan!)] one of the members of the nearby crowd calls out as she sees the three of you exit the store. As the rest of Helena's fans start to shout and rush forwards, the harpy matriarch coolly tells them that she has no time at the moment, before gracefully striding off down the street. #IF(scarlett.isLikesPlayer()) Giving you one last smile, #ELSE Giving you one last scowl, #ENDIF Scarlett follows her matriarch, and as the two of them head off on their way to see Scarlett's sister, the fans let out out a collective sigh of disappointment. #ENDIF

With nothing left to do here except leave and #IF(game.getDayOfWeek()==DOW_FRIDAY) [style.colourMinorGood(return on Monday morning)] #ELSE [style.colourMinorGood(return tomorrow morning)] #ENDIF at the earliest, you turn away from the shop and prepare to head off into Slaver Alley...

Pushing open the front door, you once again find yourself stepping inside Helena's shop. Looking across to the other side of the room, you see the beautiful harpy matriarch perfectly postured upon one of the designer sofas. Noticing your entry, she makes a dismissive gesture with of one of her white-feathered wings and gently calls out, [helena.speech([pc.Name], please, I do not wish for you to bother me until you have returned my dear Scarlett to me.)]

Knowing that your lingering presence would be likely to ruin Helena's positive opinion of you, you decide that it'd be for the best if you were to turn around and quickly make your leave...

Pushing open the front door, you once again find yourself stepping inside Helena's shop. Looking across to the other side of the room, you see the beautiful harpy matriarch perfectly postured upon one of the designer sofas. Noticing your entry, and seeing that [scarlett.name] is not with you, she makes a dismissive gesture with of one of her white-feathered wings and gently calls out, [helena.speech([pc.Name], please, I do not wish for you to bother me until you have relayed to my dear Scarlett my desire to speak with her.)]

Knowing that your lingering presence would be likely to ruin Helena's positive opinion of you, you decide that it'd be for the best if you were to turn around and quickly make your leave...

Yet again, you find yourself pushing open the door to Helena's Boutique and stepping inside. Just as you've seen her doing before, the beautiful harpy matriarch is regally postured upon one of the designer sofas, while Scarlett is slouched down behind the counter. Looking up from the fashion magazine she was reading, Helena calls over to her subordinate, [helena.speech(Scarlett, please take this opportunity to practice what I've taught you.)]

Rolling her eyes, the raven-harpy stands up from behind the counter and obediently steps forwards to greet you. Although you're used to seeing Scarlett wearing her usual tight black jeans and sleeveless turtleneck jumper, Helena has made her wear a light pink skater dress, along with a black velvet choker that hugs tightly to her slender neck. Reaching down to take hold of the hem of her skirt, she grits her teeth and stiffly curtsies at you, before saying in an obviously-forced, sweet tone, [scarlett.speech(Welcome to Helena's Boutique, [pc.sir]. How may I assist you today?)]

[helena.speech(Very good, Scarlett,)] Helena softly calls out, before reminding her subordinate, [helena.speech(Don't you have something to give to [pc.name]?)]

[scarlett.speech(Yes, Helena,)] the raven-harpy relies, before sharply turning to one side and stomping over to retrieve a bag from behind the counter. Handing it over to you, she says, [scarlett.speech(These were the items I was still in possession of when you sold me to Helena.)]

Having put down her magazine, Helena elegantly strides over to stand beside Scarlett, before reaching up to stroke her head-feathers and asking, [helena.speech(See? It wasn't embarrassing to be seen in your new dress, was it?)]

[helena.speech(Very good, Scarlett,)] Helena softly calls out, before putting down her magazine and elegantly striding over to stand beside her subordinate. Reaching up to stroke her head-feathers, she asks, [helena.speech(See? It wasn't embarrassing to be seen in your new dress, was it?)]

[scarlett.speech(Helena... Please...)] Scarlett replies, clenching her feathered fists as her cheeks flush bright red in a combination of anger and humiliation.

Choosing to ignore Scarlett's reaction, the regal matriarch smiles at you and commands, [helena.speech(Follow me, [pc.name]. I wish to show you something.)]

With that, she gracefully pivots about, before pacing over to the door which leads to the back room...

Wanting to know if Helena is really serious about leaving her nest behind to focus on running this shop of hers, you ask her what sort of plans she has in store for the future.

[helena.speech(Please do not assume that we are on such familiar terms with one another that you may boldly start inquiring into my personal affairs,)] Helena calmly states. Before you're able to offer a reply to this, however, she continues, [helena.speech(As it so happens, I am in a good mood today, and so I shall grant you an answer to your insolent question.)]

Despite what she's just said about being willing to answer you, Helena stops talking, and simply waits for you to say something with an expectant look on her beautiful face...

Realising what it is that the harpy matriarch is waiting for, you thank her for agreeing to answer your question.

[helena.speech(That's better,)] Helena states after you've finished conveying your appreciation, [helena.speech(but I do expect you to respond in a more expedient manner in our future conversations. Is that understood?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Helena,)] you respond, causing a soft smile to settle on the haughty matriarch's face.

Seeing no reason for why the harpy matriarch has stopped talking, you prompt her, [pc.speech(So, are you going to answer my question then?)]

[helena.speech(Such insolence,)] Helena muses, allowing her eyebrows to furrow a little in a clear display of annoyance. With a small sigh, she explains, [helena.speech(Do you even realise how fortunate you are to be allowed to speak to me in such a casual manner? I expect you to at the very least thank me for my generosity before I continue.)]

Realising that you're not going to get any information out of this haughty harpy matriarch before doing as she asks, you thank her for agreeing to answer your question.

[helena.speech(Very good,)] she says, gesturing for you to step closer as she continues, [helena.speech(Concerning my plans for this store, all I can really say for now is that there's not much chance of them ever coming to fruition. Even with my unparalleled business acumen, the most that can be done is to simply keep the place from having to close down. Without receiving any help, there's absolutely no way that I can implement my ambitious plans.)]

[pc.speech(Why don't you get some harpies from your nest to help?)] you ask, wondering why Helena hasn't ordered her flock to help her.

[helena.speech(You really do ask so many questions,)] Helena complains, but with nothing else to occupy her time, she chooses to answer you once again, [helena.speech(Ordering my followers to help would be akin to openly admitting that I cannot succeed without them. I'd sooner close this store down and say that it was out of boredom rather than risk damaging my reputation. Hopefully that's enough to satisfy your curiosity.)]

As she's quite clearly unwilling to reveal the specifics of any plans she's made for her business, you decide against asking Helena any more about it. If you really wanted to, however, you could always offer to provide the help she needs...

Deciding that it would be worth your time to assist Helena in improving her business, you ask her if she's got any particular jobs that she needs some help with.

[helena.speech(You wish to offer me your services?)] the matriarch asks, [helena.speech(I do feel obligated to warn you that I'll be expecting nothing less than your absolute, unquestioning obedience.)]

Telling Helena that you'd be prepared to do whatever it is that she asks of you, you wait patiently as she thinks to herself for a moment, before saying, #IF(pc.getRace().equals(RACE_HARPY)) [helena.speech(I suppose that as you are a harpy, it would be socially acceptable for me to receive your help, even if you aren't a member of my flock...)] #ELSEIF(pc.getRace().equals(RACE_DEMON)) [helena.speech(Normally, I wouldn't consider accepting help from someone who isn't a harpy, but I do find myself in a rather desperate situation... Besides, considering the fact that you are a demon, I suppose that my reputation wouldn't suffer if it were to be found out that you were working for me...)] #ELSE [helena.speech(Normally, I wouldn't consider accepting help from someone who isn't a harpy, but I do find myself in a rather desperate situation... I suppose that I can always have you transformed later on if need be...)] #ENDIF

[pc.speech(So you'll accept my help?)] you ask, beginning to realise why Helena doesn't already have anyone assisting her.

[helena.speech(I suppose so, yes,)] Helena ungratefully replies, before concluding, [helena.speech(Considering the circumstances, I think you'll need only pay a token amount of ten thousand flames. You really should count yourself extremely fortunate in this regard; the last person to have offered me their help was the craftsman who carved my throne, and if I recall correctly, I charged him no less than half a million for the privilege.)]

To begin with, the sheer audacity of what Helena is suggesting leaves you struggling to comprehend her words. As she finishes talking, however, you're left with no doubt that she means for you to pay her ten thousand flames, seemingly for the honour of being allowed to help her...

More than happy to pay Helena for the opportunity to be working for her, you set the ten thousand flames which she's asking for down on the counter top.

[helena.speech(I am most pleased to see that you understand the way the world works,)] the matriarch says as she shamelessly takes your money and places it into one of her drawers. Letting out a small sigh, she then laments, [helena.speech(You wouldn't believe the number of people who seem to expect me to pay them in these sorts of situations. They simply can not comprehend how lucky they are to have been given the opportunity to work for me. You understand how fortunate you are, don't you, [pc.name]?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Helena,)] you quickly reply.

Although you're more than happy to pay Helena for the opportunity to be working for her, you only have [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames, and so you have to tell her that you don't have the ten thousand which she's asking for.

[helena.speech(I honestly expected better of you, [pc.name],)] the matriarch says with a mildly-disapproving look on her face, [helena.speech(I suppose that such a paltry sum will have to do. Please do proceed with placing it on the counter.)]

Having already decided that you want to pay her, you do as Helena instructs and place all of your money down on the counter-top in front of her.

[helena.speech(At least I can be satisfied knowing that you understand the way the world works,)] the matriarch says as she shamelessly takes all of your money and places it into one of her drawers. Letting out a small sigh, she then laments, [helena.speech(You wouldn't believe the number of people who seem to expect me to pay them in these sorts of situations. They simply can not comprehend how lucky they are to have been given the opportunity to work for me. You understand how fortunate you are, don't you, [pc.name]?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Helena,)] you quickly reply.

Although you'd like to do as Helena says, you don't have a single flame in your possession, and so you have to tell her that you aren't able to offer her the payment which she's expecting of you.

[helena.speech(I honestly expected better of you, [pc.name],)] the matriarch says with a disapproving look on her face, [helena.speech(I can't quite believe I'm saying this, but considering both of our circumstances, I am willing to waive your fee.)]

Helena pauses after saying this, allowing you to quickly offer her your thanks.

[helena.speech(I suppose I can be at least a little satisfied seeing that you seem to understand the way the world works,)] the matriarch says, before lamenting, [helena.speech(You wouldn't believe the number of people who seem to expect me to pay them in these sorts of situations. They simply can not comprehend how lucky they are to have been given the opportunity to work for me. You understand how fortunate you are, don't you, [pc.name]?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, Helena,)] you quickly reply.

Thinking that it's absolutely outrageous for Helena to be asking for money from you, you tell her that she's being extremely unreasonable, and that in normal circumstances, she would be the one having to pay you.

[helena.speech(I see that you're one of those naive fools who doesn't understand the way the world works,)] the matriarch says with an annoyed look on her face, [helena.speech(You simply can not comprehend how lucky you are to have been given the opportunity to work for me. Why, I've even had people beg to become my slave before! How dare you expect to be allowed to work for me for free!)]

[pc.speech(So you don't need my assistance then?)] you ask, seeking to force Helena into admitting that she is desperate for your help.

[helena.speech(If you would please be so kind, I would prefer it if you didn't put words into my mouth,)] the matriarch snaps, before closing her eyes for a moment and letting out a deep breath. After a moment spent in this meditative state, she opens her eyes again and admits, [helena.speech(I do still require your help. Despite your insufferable display of arrogance, I will be so kind as to waive your fee. I cannot impresses upon you enough how lucky you are to be getting away with this; if a member of my flock dared to treat me in this manner, then I would have seriously considered having them enslaved. As it so happens, you are not a member of my flock, so all I shall demand of you is that you properly apologise for your insolence.)]

Despite her haughtiness, you find yourself still wanting to help Helena, and so you do as she says and apologise to her.

[helena.speech(Very good,)] the harpy says, before using one of her magnificent white wings to point towards the door at the rear of the shop and ordering, [helena.speech(Fetch the box of supplies from the back room and bring it out here.)]

Doing as you're told, you head into the back room in order to retrieve the box of supplies which Helena is talking about. Surprisingly enough, this room is almost as large as the main shop floor itself, but despite its size, the only pieces of furniture to be seen in here are a couple of basic wooden chairs and an old table which looks to have seen better days. Sitting upon this table, there's a large cardboard box, which must be the one you're here to fetch.

Picking up the box, which turns out to be surprisingly heavy, you walk back out into the main shop and set it down next to where Helena is sitting. Gesturing at the box with one wing, the matriarch commands, [helena.speech(Open it and stack the contents by the front door.)]

Once again doing as you're told, you first move the box over to the shop's entrance, before opening it and starting to unpack the contents. It's immediately apparent as to why it was so heavy, as it contains no less than six large cans of white paint, along with several paint brushes, rollers, and stacks of sandpaper. Once you're done, you return to Helena, who reveals, [helena.speech(I have been assured that there are enough supplies in there to completely strip and repaint the store's frontage. The only thing which is missing is the golden paint required for the replacement of the name 'Scarlett's Shop'. You will obtain this paint for me.)]

Holding up one of her feathered fingers to indicate that you should wait for a moment, the harpy then leans down and starts opening some of the drawers behind the counter.

It only takes a moment for Helena to find what it she was looking for, and with a graceful swish of her white-feathered wing, she throws what looks to be a promotional brochure down onto the counter-top in front of you. Opening it up onto a page which she's previously bookmarked, the harpy points to an image of a can of paint, saying, [helena.speech(This is the one you will purchase. Make sure that it's the 'Purple-star' brand; I will not accept anything less than the very best.)]

Taking a closer look at the brochure, you see that it's advertising the home-improvements store, 'Argus's DIY Depot'.
